net.automatalib.automata.simple

Interface SimpleAutomaton<S,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - state class.
    I - input symbol class.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<S>, SimpleTS<S,I>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Automaton<S,I,T>, DeterministicAutomaton<S,I,T>, DetOutputAutomaton<S,I,T,D>, DetSuffixOutputAutomaton<S,I,T,D>, DFA<S,I>, FiniteAlphabetAutomaton<S,I,T>, FiniteStateAcceptor<S,I>, MealyMachine<S,I,T,O>, MooreMachine<S,I,T,O>, MutableAutomaton<S,I,T,SP,TP>, MutableDeterministic<S,I,T,SP,TP>, MutableDFA<S,I>, MutableFSA<S,I>, MutableMealyMachine<S,I,T,O>, MutableMooreMachine<S,I,T,O>, MutableNFA<S,I>, MutableProbabilisticMealy<S,I,T,O>, NFA<S,I>, OutputAutomaton<S,I,T,D>, ProbabilisticMealyMachine<S,I,T,O>, ShrinkableAutomaton<S,I,T,SP,TP>, ShrinkableDeterministic<S,I,T,SP,TP>, SimpleDeterministicAutomaton<S,I>, TransitionOutputAutomaton<S,I,T,O>, UniversalAutomaton<S,I,T,SP,TP>, UniversalDeterministicAutomaton<S,I,T,SP,TP>, UniversalFiniteAlphabetAutomaton<S,I,T,SP,TP>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBricsAutomaton, AbstractCompactDeterministic, AbstractCompactSimpleDet, AbstractCompactSimpleNondet, BricsDFA, BricsNFA, CompactDFA, CompactMealy, CompactNFA, FastDFA, FastMealy, FastMoore, FastMutableDet, FastMutableNondet, FastNFA, FastProbMealy, UniversalCompactSimpleDet

    public interface SimpleAutomaton<S,I>
extends SimpleTS<S,I>, Iterable<S>
    A simple automaton, i.e., a SimpleTS with a finite number of states.
    Author:
    Malte Isberner

      • createStaticStateMapping

        @Nonnull
default <V> MutableMapping<S,V> createStaticStateMapping()
        Description copied from interface: SimpleTS
        Creates a MutableMapping allowing to associate arbitrary data with this transition system's states. The returned mapping is however only guaranteed to work correctly if the transition system is not modified.
        Specified by:
        createStaticStateMapping in interface SimpleTS<S,I>
        Returns:
        the mutable mapping
